channel.title: Comments on: Wireless pocket snifer
channel.description: I am multiple and various - Tomas A. Krag

item.title: By: cowboy
item.dc:creator: cowboy
item.description: Smart ID has its version of WiFi detector, WFS-1. There is a very interesting evaluation of SMARTID detectector WFS-1 against Kensington WiFi Finder in http://www.securityfocus.com/infocus/1727. More discussions in www.gizmodo.com The choice is clear.
item.content:encoded:
Smart ID has its version of WiFi detector, WFS-1.
There is a very interesting evaluation of SMARTID detectector WFS-1 against Kensington WiFi Finder in http://www.securityfocus.com/infocus/1727.
More discussions in http://www.gizmodo.com/
The choice is clear.

item.title: By: Tomas
item.dc:creator: Tomas
item.description: Yes, I just ordered a handful of these detectors for my company. They should arrive any day now.
item.content:encoded: Yes, I just ordered a handful of these detectors for my company. They should arrive any day now.
